Hong Kong: Eastern lead the way

Eduardo Praes netted the decisive goal as Eastern SC claimed an entertaining 3-2 victory over Lee Man to make it two wins from two in the Hong Kong Premier League on Sunday to move top of the standings.

Southern District are in second place but let a 3-1 lead slip against BC Rangers, conceding twice in the last five minutes to draw 3-3 on Saturday while Pegasus are in third following a 1-0 win over bottom side Resources Capital.

Defending champions Kitchee SC, meanwhile, have drawn their opening two games after they played out a 1-1 draw against Happy Valley.
